homepage.title: Smart home, Lighting, Lamps, Smart buildings | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
homepage.description: iHome - We make smart buildings live together with their users. Discover our capabilities in supporting building automation processes.

reset-password.title: Reset Password | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
reset-password.description: Reset your password for your iHome store account. Benefit from our technical support in choosing smart devices and lighting. We provide convenient and secure login as well as comprehensive smart-home services. Join our community today!

login.title: Log in | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
login.description: Log in to the professional iHome store. Get technical support in choosing intelligent devices and smart lighting. We offer convenient and secure login for you to enjoy comprehensive smart-home services. Join our community today!

forgot-password.title: Reset Password | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
forgot-password.description: Reset your password for your iHome store account. Come back to us to benefit from our technical support in choosing smart devices and intelligent lighting. We offer convenient and secure login options so you can enjoy comprehensive smart home services. Come back to our community today!

registration.title: Sign in | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
registration.description: Reset your password for your iHome store account. Come back to us to benefit from our technical support in choosing smart devices and intelligent lighting. We offer convenient and secure login options so you can enjoy comprehensive smart home services. Come back to our community today!

404.title: 404 - Error | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
404.description: Oh no! It seems that there has been a mistake. Our iHome smart-home store cannot find the page you are looking for. Please check the correctness of the URL or use navigation to discover innovative solutions for a smart home. Immerse yourself in the world of automation and comfort with our range of products. Feel free to continue your search!

settings.title: Account Settings | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
settings.description: Customize your account settings in the iHome online store. Update your profile, manage personal data, and enjoy personalized online shopping. Familiarize yourself with our privacy policy and take advantage of our assistance at any time.

cart.title: Cart | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
cart.description: Your cart at iHome store offering intelligent solutions for your home! Assemble the most innovative solutions to make your interior smart and functional. Add our latest products to your cart that will ease your daily life and provide exceptional comfort in your home. Explore a range of smart devices that will make your home even more exceptional.

cart-account.title: Cart - Form | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
cart-account.description: Start a seamless ordering process now! Fill out the form on our online store iHome. Quickly, conveniently, and safely. Gain access to a wide range of products and start taking advantage of our attractive offers. Your shopping - your choice, with us, it's simple!

cart-summary.title: Cart - Summary | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
cart-summary.description: Confirmation of order for iHome - thank you for making a purchase in our store! We appreciate your trust and the choice of our products. The iHome team is ready to provide you with an excellent shopping experience and reliable customer service. We are here to meet your expectations.

my-addresses.title: My addresses | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
my-addresses.description: Add, remove, and update your addresses effortlessly. All your addresses in one place - manage them with ease.

edit-profile.title: Edit profile | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
edit-profile.description: Customize your personal data, manage account preferences, and personalize your profile. Easily update information and adjust privacy settings, ensuring full control over your iHome Smart-Home account. Discover new possibilities and ensure your profile is always up-to-date.

favourites.title: Favourites | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
favourites.description: Add the most interesting products to your favourites list and easily track their availability and promotions. Find inspiration among the latest trends and discover why our store is the place where your dreams become reality. Feel free to browse our collection and create your unique list of favourite products today!

order-tracking.title: Order Tracking | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
order-tracking.description: Track your shipment and stay updated with the current delivery status. Find out where your package is currently located. Monitor your order in real-time, track the shipment route, and expect a hassle-free delivery.

order-details.title: Order Details | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
order-details.description: Review the details of your order - monitor information related to your purchase. Check the current status, payment details, and track the delivery. Use our system to stay updated on the progress of fulfillment. Best customer service and fast delivery guaranteed.

orders.title: My orders | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
orders.description: Stay informed about the current status and details of all your orders on our platform. Track the fulfillment process, delivery dates, and effortlessly manage your purchases. We provide transparency and convenience for you to easily monitor the history of your orders.

product-details.title: | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
product-details.description: Product details - discover everything you need to know to make an informed choice. Review comprehensive technical information, learn about unique features, and see how our product can meet your individual needs. High-quality photos and detailed descriptions will help you get closer to this product and appreciate its uniqueness.

products.title: Products | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
products.description: Discover the future of the smart home with our diverse range of Smart Home products. We provide innovative solutions that offer complete control over your home with just a click. Find the perfect devices, such as smart locks, thermostats, lighting, and cameras, that adapt to your lifestyle. Create a unique environment that combines functionality, comfort, and energy efficiency. Browse our Smart Home product list now and start transforming your surroundings into a place that responds to your needs.

search.title: Search | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
search.description: Find exactly what you're looking for using the search engine on our website. Enter keywords, phrases, or categories to quickly locate information, products, or content available on our portal. Use our search feature to save time and effortlessly access the products that interest you.

configurator.title: Configurator | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
configurator.description: Set up a smart home with our intuitive configurator. Choose the right devices, harmonize systems, and enjoy modern solutions for your home.

admin-new-users.title: New profiles | iHome - Intelligent Devices and Smart Home | Smart-Home
admin-new-users.description: Effective management of new customer profiles. A convenient table facilitates quick recognition, token generation, and profile deletion.
